image captionCan Disney's Raya embody a 'South East Asian' identity?
It's taken almost 90 years - but Disney's first South East Asian heroine premiered on Thursday.

articles.description: After almost 90 years of animated films, Disney has finally ventured into South East Asia.
articles.title: Raya and the Last Dragon: Disney's new heroine representing 670 million people - BBC News

articles.content: PETALING JAYA: Malaysian shoppers can look forward to seeing their purchases delivered by automated drones in the future as AirAsia Digital partners with the Malaysian Global Innovation and Creativit… [+2578 chars]
articles.description: PETALING JAYA: Malaysian shoppers can look forward to seeing their purchases delivered by automated drones in the future as AirAsia Digital partners with the Malaysian Global Innovation and Creativity Centre (MaGIC) to launch the Urban Drone Delivery Sandbox.
articles.title: AirAsia and MaGIC team up to roll out future service - The Star Online

articles.content: More than 20,000 US organisations have been compromised through a back door installed via recently patched flaws in Microsoft Corp’s email software, a person familiar with the US government’s respons… [+1996 chars]

articles.title: White House fears 20,000 businesses worldwide caught in Microsoft hack - The New Daily

articles.content: She didn't have a boyfriend when she was in school because her parents celebrities Edmund Chen and Xiang Yun and older brother were very protective of her. Dad only loosened up gradually when she was… [+855 chars]
articles.description: She didn't have a boyfriend when she was in school because her parents — celebrities Edmund Chen and Xiang Yun — and older brother were very protective of her. Dad only loosened up gradually when she was in polytechnic, 21-year-old Chen Yixin told local media…
